info.name: StumbleUpon - Hide Facebook/Twitter in Share Menu
info.description:
Recent StumbleUpon Toolbar changes move the non-optional Twitter entry in the Share menu to the top and add a Facebook option above it.

Remove both of them.
info.additionalInfo: 2011-03-02: Updated to work with toolbar v3.81.

data.title: Doesn't work with New SU toolbar version
